original_title: Kerosene price reduced with effect from Wednesday (1).
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The price of a liter of kerosene will be reduced by Rs. 50/- with effect from midnight on Wednesday (1).
The price of a liter of Lanka Industrial Kerosene will be reduced by Rs. 134/-.
However, the prices of Petrol and Diesel will remain at current prices.
